title: Typographical brand film
content:
I went to see an exhibition on best of Finnish advertising and graphic design in 2007, and this was shown there

[http://www.borenius.com/export/download/BK-video/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131103104137/http:/www.borenius.com/export/download/BK-video/index.html "http://www.borenius.com/export/download/BK-video/index.html")

About the competition:  
 [https://www.grafia.fi/index.php?sid=12085537030075068e4fa80b72980e5c8ca1...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131103104137/https:/www.grafia.fi/index.php?sid=12085537030075068e4fa80b72980e5c8ca1cbbe93&rand=0035027623&article_id=10960& __from_id__ =10933&language=english "https://www.grafia.fi/index.php?sid=12085537030075068e4fa80b72980e5c8ca1cbbe93&rand=0035027623&article\_id=10960&\_\_from\_id\_\_=10933&language=english")
author: mili

comments.content:
"No time for bull," I like it :-)

ChrisL

Nice production and sentiments. Narration a little spooky, though. As a client, not sure if I would approach a firm whose voice is like Evil's from [Time Bandits](http://web.archive.org/web/20131103104137/http:/www.imdb.com/title/tt0081633/).
